games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: Back To School: Uniforms Edition
games.description: Explore global fashion in Back to School: Uniforms Edition! This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Customize your character with stylish outfits, accessories, and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Dive into the diversity of school uniforms and become a fashion expert while having fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Explore global fashion in Back to School: Uniforms Edition! This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Customize your character with stylish outfits, accessories, and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Dive into the diversity of school uniforms and become a fashion expert while having fun!
Use your mouse to play the game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

games.title: Easter Funny Makeup
games.description: Eliza and her niece are getting ready for Easter in the most creative way—by designing festive face art! Use cheerful symbols of the season like Easter eggs, bunnies, flowers, butterflies, and rainbows to craft a bright and joyful spring look.
games.howToPlayText: Choose your favorite decorations and apply them to the character’s face. Mix and match symbols to create a unique design. When you’re done, save your artwork as a PNG image!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/easter-funny-makeup-bc23-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Fashion Week 2025
games.description: Get ready to rule the runway in Fashion Week 2025! Style 5 stunning models in high-fashion looks for the most glamorous fashion event of the year! From Chanel-inspired elegance to punk rock rebellion, create jaw-dropping outfits across five unique themes. Mix and match couture dresses, bold accessories, and trendy hairstyles to make every model shine! Are you ready to become the ultimate fashion stylist? Play now and slay the runway!
games.howToPlayText:
Style 5 models with couture, accessories & hairstyles. Be the ultimate stylist!
Use your mouse to play the game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/fashion-week-2025?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Makeup Fruits
games.description: Have you ever imagined transforming a watermelon into a stunning masterpiece? At Makeup Fruits, you can creatively enhance fruits with cosmetics. Enjoy this fun game on your device and explore a vibrant world of fruity style, where each transformation allows you to express your flair.
games.howToPlayText:
Have you ever imagined giving a watermelon a makeover? How about adding a flutter of eyelashes or a swipe of lipstick to a juicy melon? In Makeup Fruits, your mission is to help these delightful fruits dazzle with beauty. It's all in your hands to adorn them with the perfect makeup and accessories for their stunning transformation!

Click to select the fruit you want to transform into a beauty icon, then proceed to choose and apply a variety of makeup options. Explore a diverse selection of brands, powder colors, eyelashes, lipsticks, stickers, and more!

At the end, you'll be able to take a "selfie" of your fabulous creation to share with your friends.

You'll also earn "gems" as a reward for your work. These gems can be used to unlock exciting new items and keep the fun going!

games.title: Gothic New Era
games.description: A goth-girl arrives at the new Academy. She did not suspect that she would fall into a nightmare, the abode of chaos and mysterious riddles. She will definitely like it there. But before the trip, the gothic princess needs to update her wardrobe while staying true to style. Only dark, gloomy shades, gothic dresses and school uniforms. Join her and help the gothgirl create a unique image of the dark princess and find friends.
games.howToPlayText: Create a Gothic look for a high school heroine. Prepare your face by eliminating all the flaws of adolescence. Apply a defiant Gothic makeup. Perhaps you should update your hairstyle. Choose from the wardrobe suitable dresses, shirts, stockings and shoes. Complement the image with some kind of accessory. Save the resulting result as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used for control.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/gothic-new-era?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Monster Makeup 3D
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Monster Makeup 3D, where you can creatively disguise monsters as humans to hide them from prying eyes. Use various tools to change their features seamlessly, but be cautious—one mistake could backfire! Enjoy this free online game on any device.
games.howToPlayText:
Features:
- Excellent 3D art style.
- Funny animations.
- Hilarious Failure experience.
- Satisfying ASMR feel.
- Get a stunning response in the end.

games.title: Cosplay Gamer Girls
games.description: Two BFF are going to a summer cosplay festival. They love computer games. Help the girls choose costumes for their favorite video game heroes and princesses. It is very important for a cosplayer to create a complete look: from makeup and hair to dress. Lots of original and gorgeous outfits are waiting for you!
games.howToPlayText: Help the girls create a cosplay based on a computer game. Apply bright makeup. Choose the appropriate items of clothing, shoes, accessories and jewelry that match the theme of this cosplay. A very important point is the choice of hairstyle or wig. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/cosplay-gamer-girls?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Dress Up Anime Girl
games.description: Anime DressUp is a fun online game that lets you style a cute anime princess. With a variety of outfits, hairstyles, and makeup, you can unleash your creativity and fashion skills. Enjoy creating unique looks and make your princess a standout fashionista in her realm!
games.howToPlayText:
Create your perfect anime character!
Make a screenshot and use it as your avatar.

Features:
1. Graphics in anime style
2. 10 692 000 combinations of the appearance
3. Many unusual items
4. Cute cats
5. Screenshot button
6. Random button
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/anime-dress-playgama?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Besties on Wednesday
games.description: A young bestie goes to school to learn magic and make new friends. She has her own special style. The girl prefers black colors in clothes and a gothic look. Her roommate likes bright colors in her clothes. It will not be easy for new acquaintances to find a common language. However, this bright girl is not as simple as it seems at first glance. She has her secrets. Try to choose for each student an image that suits her perfectly. And one day these besties will be BFF.
games.howToPlayText: Fate brings together two very different girls-students in the walls of the School of Magic. Help the girls create their own unique image: choose make up, hairstyles, outfits and accessories, that match the characters of the girls. And, perhaps, they will eventually become best friends. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screen is used for control.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/besties-on-wednesday?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>
